OrgName.entry: AGE CONCERN SHEFFIELD - LIVING SAFE AND SECURE

Desc.entry:
A chargeable service that is available to anyone aged 50 years or over, including those in receipt of direct payments, who would like to purchase one-to-one support to help with practical tasks such as: gardening (cutting lawns & hedges), tidying up outdoors (sweeping paths to cleaning windows), small DIY type jobs, sorting out utilities, discharge from hospital, help to find a new home or help to find a handyperson or tradesperson.
Support is tailored to the needs of the individual via support planning. The support is purchased in a package of 3, 2 hour sessions delivered over a six week period. Alternatively you can purchase a one off 4 hour package for a garden tidy, a 3 hour package for a front door spruce (painting, door chains, spy holes). Please contact for more information.
